summary: The long requested customizer for Velina Velaire
descriptionHtml:
[font=Verdana][center][img]http://imageshack.com/a/img922/3824/I4gE07.png[/img]

[color=#93c47d][size=3][b][i][url=https://www.facebook.com/ClearanceClarenceMods][img]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/640x480q90/924/cG7PGI.png[/img][/url]
[/i][/b][/size][/color]
[size=3][color=#e69138][b][i]Screenshots are Wanted! If some of you could upload some screenshots it would be much appreciated!
[/i][/b][/color][/size]
[size=3]This mod allows you to change the way Velina Velaire looks. You can change the body textures, teeth, face and eyes.
[/size]

[img]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/320x240q90/922/tUyKv0.png[/img]

[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59974/?]Velina Velaire - Custom Voiced Follower BETA[/url][/size]
[size=4]If you plan to use TBBP meshes, you also require the following:[/size]
[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics Extensions[/url][/size]
[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54044/?]HDT Breast And Butt Physics[/url][/size]
[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton - XPMS [/url] or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton Extended - XPMSE[/url][/size]

[img]http://imageshack.com/a/img924/2578/9D7W5O.png[/img]

[color=#0b8db3][size=6]Manual Installation[/size][/color]
[size=3]Download the package you want and extract it using WinRar. Now you have 3 folders. Base, FOMod and Options. Delete the FOMod folder since you won't need it. Now go to the base folder and select the bodytype you want and open that folder and copy the .nif files to [i][color=#6aa84f]meshes\actors\character\Victoria Velina[/color][/i] and overwrite the .nif files. Now the body is installed. Now go into the options folder and chose what kind of texture you want. Once you find it open it and copy all the files to [i][color=#6aa84f]textures\actors\character\Victoria Velina[/color][/i]. The eyes goes into the [i][color=#6aa84f]textures\actors\character\Victoria Velina\eyes[/color][/i] folder. The mouth goes into [i][color=#6aa84f]textures\actors\character\Victoria Velina\Teeth[/color][/i].[/size]
